name: thunder-shock
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black_white: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
